BOSspring.text: Hello @  ^-I want you to have this as a present. My people say it hold a mysterious power in the season of spring that no one can explain, hope you can find out what it was.^^     - Krobus
BOSsummer.text: Hello @  ^-I want you to have this as a present. My people say it hold a mysterious power in the season of summer that no one can explain, hope you can find out what it was.^^     - Krobus
BOSfall.text: Hello @  ^-I want you to have this as a present. My people say it hold a mysterious power in the season of fall that no one can explain, hope you can find out what it was.^^     - Krobus
BOSwinter.text: Hello @  ^-I want you to have this as a present. My people say it hold a mysterious power in the season of winter that no one can explain, hope you can find out what it was.^^     - Krobus
BOSseasons.text: Hello @  ^-I want you to have this as a present. My people say it hold the combine power of four seasons that no one can explain, hope you can find out what it was.^^     - Krobus
BOSspring.title: Book Of Spring
